name: Biomarker Testing
description: Biomarker testing is a way to look for genes, proteins, and other substances (called biomarkers or tumor markers) that can provide information about cancer.

name: Chemotherapy
description: Chemotherapy is a type of cancer treatment that uses drugs to kill cancer cells. Learn how chemotherapy works against cancer.

name: Hormone Therapy
description: Hormone therapy is a treatment that slows or stops the growth of breast and prostate cancers that use hormones to grow.

name: Hyperthermia
description: Hyperthermia is a type of treatment in which body tissue is heated to as high as 113 Â°F to help damage and kill cancer cells with little .

name: Radiation Therapy
description: Immunotherapy is a type of cancer treatment that helps your immune system fight cancer. This page covers the types of immunotherapy.

name: Stem Cell Transplant
description: Stem cell transplants are procedures that restore stem cells that grow into blood cells in people who have had theirs destroyed by high doses.
